text: Kare-ra wa,`ōse ni shitagaimasu.' To iuga, ichido anata no mae kara tachisaru to, anata ga itta no to wa chigatta koto o yomosugara sakubō suru. Daga arrā wa kare-ra no shūya no sakubō o kiroku nasa reru. Dakara anata wa kare-ra kara tōzakari, arrā ni o sugari shi nasai. Makotoni arrā wa hogo-sha to shite banzende ara reru
